main event: Witnesses in Sylvania, Ohio reported sighting saucer-like objects emitting bright light that disappeared instantly.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 1-2 minutes,The objects were reported as having windows of bright light and dark contrast,There were contradictory statements about telepathic communication with the object prior to sighting,Witness estimated the object to be 20 to 30 feet in diameter,The object was mentioned as moving fast and then stopping completely before disappearing.
